sql.if: and (t.yjdzsheng LIKE concat(concat('%',#{yjdz}),'%') or t.yjdzshi LIKE concat(concat('%',#{yjdz}),'%') or t.yjdzxx LIKE concat(concat('%',#{yjdz}),'%'))

mapper.sql: t.qyid qyid, t.userid userid, t.zwgsmc zwgsmc, t.ywgsmc ywgsmc, t.frdb frdb, t.frdbdh frdbdh, t.yjdzsheng yjdzsheng, t.yjdzshi yjdzshi, t.yjdzxx yjdzxx, t.bgdh bgdh, t.cz cz, t.lxr lxr, t.lxrsj lxrsj, t.wz wz, t.dzyx dzyx, t.yyzz yyzz, t.sjzt sjzt, t.shzt shzt, t.shrid shrid, t.shrmc shrmc, TO_CHAR(t.shsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') shsj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.qrzt qrzt, TO_CHAR(t.qrsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') qrsj, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4, t.email email, t.yyzzgs yyzzgs, t.src src, t.gsjc gsjc
mapper.select:
SELECT , c2.code_name sjztmc, c4.code_name shztmc, c6.code_name yjdzshengmc, c8.code_name yjdzshimc, s.username username, s.usertype usertype, k.tyshxydm FROM CFPA_QY_JBXX t
Left Join SYS_ACCOUNT s on s.userid = t.userid AND s.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
Left Join CFPA_QY_KPXX k on t.qyid = k.qyid AND k.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'SJZT' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.sjzt = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'SHZT' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c4.CODEID = c3.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.shzt = c4.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c5 on c5.CODETYPE = 'XZQH' And c5.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c6 On c6.CODEID = c5.CODEID And c6.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.yjdzsheng = c6.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c7 on c7.CODETYPE = 'XZQH' And c7.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c8 On c8.CODEID = c7.CODEID And c8.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.yjdzshi = c8.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.QYID = #{value}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS qyid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO CFPA_QY_JBXX(qyid,userid,zwgsmc,ywgsmc,frdb,frdbdh,yjdzsheng,yjdzshi,yjdzxx,bgdh,cz,lxr,lxrsj,wz,dzyx,yyzz,sjzt,shzt,shrid,shrmc,shsj,delete_flag,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4,email,yyzzgs,src) VALUES(#{qyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zwgsmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ywgsmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{frdb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{frdbdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yjdzsheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yjdzshi,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yjdzxx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bgdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{lxr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{lxrsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{wz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dzyx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yyzz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{shzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{shrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{shrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{shsj,jdbcType=DATE},'N',#{cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},sysdate,#{xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve4,jdbcType=DATE},#{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yyzzgs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{src,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: UPDATE CFPA_QY_JBXX t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND t.QYID = #{value}

INSERT INTO CFPA_QY_JBXX(qyid,userid,zwgsmc,ywgsmc,frdb,frdbdh,yjdzsheng,yjdzshi,yjdzxx,bgdh,cz,lxr,lxrsj,wz,dzyx,yyzz,sjzt,shzt,shrid,shrmc,shsj,delete_flag,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4,email,yyzzgs,src) VALUES
#{item.qyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} qyid,#{item.userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} userid,#{item.zwgsmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zwgsmc,#{item.ywgsmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ywgsmc,#{item.frdb,jdbcType=VARCHAR} frdb,#{item.frdbdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} frdbdh,#{item.yjdzsheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yjdzsheng,#{item.yjdzshi,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yjdzshi,#{item.yjdzxx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yjdzxx,#{item.bgdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bgdh,#{item.cz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cz,#{item.lxr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} lxr,#{item.lxrsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR} lxrsj,#{item.wz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} wz,#{item.dzyx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dzyx,#{item.yyzz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yyzz,#{item.sjzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} sjzt,#{item.shzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} shzt,#{item.shrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} shrid,#{item.shrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} shrmc,#{item.shsj,jdbcType=DATE} shsj,'N' delete_flag,#{item.cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrid,#{item.cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrmc,#{item.cjsj,jdbcType=DATE} cjsj,#{item.xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrid,#{item.xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrmc,#{item.xgsj,jdbcType=DATE} xgsj,#{item.reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve1,#{item.reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve2,#{item.reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve3,#{item.reserve4,jdbcType=DATE} reserve4,#{item.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR} email,#{item.yyzzgs,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yyzzgs,#{item.src,jdbcType=VARCHAR} src
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE qyid = VALUES(qyid), userid = VALUES(userid), zwgsmc = VALUES(zwgsmc), ywgsmc = VALUES(ywgsmc), frdb = VALUES(frdb), frdbdh = VALUES(frdbdh), yjdzsheng = VALUES(yjdzsheng), yjdzshi = VALUES(yjdzshi), yjdzxx = VALUES(yjdzxx), bgdh = VALUES(bgdh), cz = VALUES(cz), lxr = VALUES(lxr), lxrsj = VALUES(lxrsj), wz = VALUES(wz), dzyx = VALUES(dzyx), yyzz = VALUES(yyzz), sjzt = VALUES(sjzt), shzt = VALUES(shzt), shrid = VALUES(shrid), shrmc = VALUES(shrmc), shsj = VALUES(shsj), delete_flag = VALUES(delete_flag), cjrid = VALUES(cjrid), cjrmc = VALUES(cjrmc), cjsj = VALUES(cjsj), xgrid = VALUES(xgrid), xgrmc = VALUES(xgrmc), xgsj = VALUES(xgsj), reserve1 = VALUES(reserve1), reserve2 = VALUES(reserve2), reserve3 = VALUES(reserve3), reserve4 = VALUES(reserve4), email = VALUES(email), yyzzgs = VALUES(yyzzgs), src = VALUES(src)
mapper.select:
SELECT , c6.code_name yjdzshengmc, c8.code_name yjdzshimc FROM CFPA_QY_JBXX t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c5 on c5.CODETYPE = 'XZQH' And c5.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c6 On c6.CODEID = c5.CODEID And c6.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.yjdzsheng = c6.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c7 on c7.CODETYPE = 'XZQH' And c7.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c8 On c8.CODEID = c7.CODEID And c8.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.yjdzshi = c8.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT s.username, s.userid, s.usertype, (CASE s.usertype WHEN 'CHN' THEN '国内' WHEN 'ENG' THEN '国外' ELSE '' END) usertypeName, u.pkid, t.qyid qyid, t.zwgsmc zwgsmc, t.ywgsmc ywgsmc, t.frdb frdb, t.frdbdh frdbdh, t.yjdzsheng yjdzsheng, t.yjdzshi yjdzshi, t.yjdzxx yjdzxx, t.bgdh bgdh, t.cz cz, t.lxr lxr, t.lxrsj lxrsj, t.wz wz, t.dzyx dzyx, t.yyzz yyzz, t.sjzt sjzt, t.shzt shzt, t.shrid shrid, t.shrmc shrmc, TO_CHAR(t.shsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') shsj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4, t.email email, t.yyzzgs yyzzgs, t.src src FROM SYS_ACCOUNT s LEFT JOIN CFPA_QY_JBXX t ON s.userid = t.userid AND t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' INNER JOIN SYS_USER u ON s.userid = u.userid AND u.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND u.deptid = 'ZSYH' WHERE s.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
and s.username LIKE concat(concat('%',#{username}),'%') ESCAPE '\'
and s.usertype = #{usertype}
and (t.zwgsmc LIKE concat(concat('%',#{zwgsmc}),'%') ESCAPE '\' and s.usertype = 'CHN') or (t.ywgsmc LIKE concat(concat('%',#{zwgsmc}),'%') ESCAPE '\' and s.usertype = 'ENG')
SELECT COUNT(1) num FROM CFPA_QY_JBXX t2 WHERE t2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t2.dzyx = #{value}

select '未确认' as qrztmc, '0' as qrzt, (t1.total - t2.qrztsl) as qrztsl, round((t1.total - t2.qrztsl) / t1.total,4)*100 as qrztpercent from (select count(*) as total from CFPA_QY_JBXX t where t.delete_flag = 'N') t1, (select count(*) as qrztsl from CFPA_QY_JBXX t where t.qrzt = 'Y' and t.delete_flag = 'N'
and t.qrsj > to_date(#{qrsj_start},'yyyy/mm/dd HH24:Mi:SS')
and t.qrsj < to_date(#{qrsj_end},'yyyy/mm/dd HH24:Mi:SS')
) t2 union select '已确认' as qrztmc, '1' as qrzt, t2.qrztsl as qrztsl, round(t2.qrztsl / t1.total,4)*100 as qrztpercent from (select count(*) as total from CFPA_QY_JBXX t where t.delete_flag = 'N') t1, (select count(*) as qrztsl from CFPA_QY_JBXX t where t.qrzt = 'Y' and t.delete_flag = 'N'
and t.qrsj > to_date(#{qrsj_start},'yyyy/mm/dd HH24:Mi:SS')
and t.qrsj < to_date(#{qrsj_end},'yyyy/mm/dd HH24:Mi:SS')
) t2

SELECT t.qyid, t.userid, t.zwgsmc, t.ywgsmc, t.lxr, t.lxrsj, t.qrzt, TO_CHAR(t.qrsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') qrsj, s.username username, s.usertype usertype FROM CFPA_QY_JBXX t
Left Join SYS_ACCOUNT s on s.userid = t.userid AND s.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
and t.qrzt ='Y'
and t.qrsj > to_date(#{qrsj_start},'yyyy/mm/dd HH24:Mi:SS')
and t.qrsj < to_date(#{qrsj_end},'yyyy/mm/dd HH24:Mi:SS')
and t.qrzt is null
or t.qrsj < to_date(#{qrsj_start},'yyyy/mm/dd HH24:Mi:SS')
or t.qrsj > to_date(#{qrsj_end},'yyyy/mm/dd HH24:Mi:SS')

SELECT t.uuid , t.src, t.cpjj, t.cplx, c2.code_name cplxmc, c4.code_name cplxmc_ENG FROM CFPA_QY_CPJS t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'CPLX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.cplx = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'CPLX_EN' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c3.CODEID = c4.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.cplx = c4.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.qyid=#{qyid} ORDER BY t.cjsj ASC

SELECT t.qyid, t.qyid qjqyid, t.zwgsmc zwgsmc, t.ywgsmc ywgsmc, j.src qyjsSrc, t1.uuid , t1.qyid cpqyid, t1.src, t1.cpjj, t1.cplx, c2.code_name cplxmc, c4.code_name cplxmc_ENG FROM CFPA_QY_JBXX t Left Join CFPA_QY_JS J on t.qyid = J.qyid And J.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
LEFT JOIN CFPA_QY_CPJS t1 on t1.qyid=t.qyid
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'CPLX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t1.cplx = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'CPLX_EN' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c3.CODEID = c4.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t1.cplx = c4.CODE_VALUE WHERE t1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
and t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND (select count(1) from cfpa_zw_jbxx z where z.delete_flag='N' AND Z.QYID= t.qyid)>0
and( ( t.zwgsmc LIKE concat(concat('%',#{reserve3}),'%') ESCAPE '\' ) or ( c2.code_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{reserve3}),'%') ESCAPE '\' ) )
ORDER BY t1.cjsj ASC ,t.qyid

SELECT distinct t.qyid FROM CFPA_QY_JBXX t Left Join CFPA_QY_JS J on t.qyid = J.qyid And J.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
LEFT JOIN CFPA_QY_CPJS t1 on t1.qyid=t.qyid
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'CPLX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t1.cplx = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'CPLX_EN' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c3.CODEID = c4.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t1.cplx = c4.CODE_VALUE WHERE t1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
and t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND (select count(1) from cfpa_zw_jbxx z where z.delete_flag='N' AND Z.QYID= t.qyid)>0
and( ( t.zwgsmc LIKE concat(concat('%',#{reserve3}),'%') ESCAPE '\' ) or ( c2.code_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{reserve3}),'%') ESCAPE '\' ) )
ORDER BY t1.cjsj ASC ,t.qyid

SELECT
t.qyid, t.qyid qjqyid, t.zwgsmc zwgsmc, t.ywgsmc ywgsmc, j.src qyjsSrc FROM CFPA_QY_JBXX t Left Join CFPA_QY_JS J on t.qyid = J.qyid And J.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND (select count(1) from cfpa_zw_jbxx z where z.delete_flag='N' AND Z.QYID= t.qyid)>0

SELECT
t.qyid, t.wz wz, t.qyid qjqyid, t.zwgsmc zwgsmc, t.ywgsmc ywgsmc, j.src qyjsSrc ,j.qyjj FROM CFPA_QY_JBXX t Left Join CFPA_QY_JS J on t.qyid = J.qyid And J.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' --- 是否已选展位 -- AND(select count(1) from cfpa_zw_jbxx z where z.delete_flag='N' AND Z.QYID= t.qyid)>0

SELECT ,
k.tyshxydm tyshxydm,
c2.code_name sjztmc, c4.code_name shztmc, s.username username, s.usertype usertype FROM CFPA_QY_JBXX t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'SJZT' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.sjzt = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'SHZT' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c4.CODEID = c3.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.shzt = c4.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_ACCOUNT s on s.userid = t.userid AND s.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
Left Join CFPA_QY_KPXX k on t.qyid = k.qyid And k.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
and ((t.zwgsmc LIKE concat(concat('%',#{gsmc}),'%') ESCAPE '\' and s.usertype = 'CHN') or (t.ywgsmc LIKE concat(concat('%',#{gsmc}),'%') ESCAPE '\' and s.usertype = 'ENG'))
SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM CFPA_QY_JBXX t WHERE 1=1 AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
